import React from 'react'; import { Button, Card, Container, FloatingLabel, Form } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { useAuthState } from 'react-firebase-hooks/auth'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import auth from '../../firebase'; import useServiceDetail from '../../hooks/useServiceDetail'; const Checkout = () => { const { serviceId } = useParams(); const [service] = useServiceDetail(serviceId); const [user] = useAuthState(auth); const handleOrder = e =>{ } return (

{service.name}

{service.description}

Please Checkout your booking
); }; export default Checkout;
